Articles.Content:
Good news everyone!

Farnsworth Rocket Surgery has been hard at work developing a long range landing craft. Meet the Cicada! Just in time for 1.05 to change it all up...

The Cicada has refueling capabilities utilizing and onboard ISRU, ore drill, and fuel cell giving it a long range.

The Cicada has room for three passengers. One in the front cockpit and two in the port and starboard 'wings'. All three crew compartments have boarding ladders.

Before you ask, yes the fuel burns off evenly so that there is never an out of balance issue. However, while your refueling, the fuel will not fill evenly. So always check the fuel tanks if you only partially re-filled the tanks with the ISRU.

The dual aerospike engines provide plenty of thrust and high pressure (atmospheric) performance along with vacuum fuel economy.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The Cicada was also featured in a new Farsworth Rocket Surgery film.

The Cicada comes with a launch vehicle for getting easily to LKO.

Action groups:

1. Toggle Landing Legs

2. Toggle Landing Lights

3. Start ISRU, Start Fuel Cell, Lower Drill.

Hit Action Group a second time to start the drill.

4. Raise and stop drill, Stop Fuel Cell, Stop ISRU.

6. Toggle Boarding Ladders.

7. Toggle Solar Array.

Hope you like it! It has taken a ton of time to design.

The Cicada is available through KerbalX in my signature.
